sqlMap.select: SELECT s.code as code, o.code as pkSupplierclass, s.name as name, s.shortname as shortname, s.tel1 as tel1, s.registerfund as registerfund, s.email as email, s.memo as memo, 0 AS supprop FROM bd_supplier s, org_orgs o WHERE s.pk_supplierclass =(SELECT pk_supplierclass FROM bd_supplierclass WHERE code='1801') AND s.dr = 0 AND o.pk_org=s.pk_org ORDER BY s.code

SELECT b.pk_bankaccbas AS pkBankaccbas, b.accname, b.accnum, b.accopendate, 1 AS acctype, b.accountproperty AS accountproperty, b.accstate AS accstate, b.enablestate AS enablestate, b.mnecode AS mnecode, bc.code AS pkBankdoc, be.code AS pkBanktype, bs.code AS customerId FROM bd_bankaccbas b JOIN bd_custbank bk ON bk.pk_bankaccbas=b.pk_bankaccbas JOIN bd_supplier bs ON bs.pk_supplier=bk.pk_cust join bd_bankdoc bc on bc.pk_bankdoc=b.pk_bankdoc join bd_banktype be on be.pk_banktype=b.pk_banktype where b.pk_bankaccbas IN (SELECT pk_bankaccbas FROM bd_custbank WHERE pk_cust IN (SELECT pk_supplier FROM bd_supplier WHERE pk_supplierclass in (SELECT pk_supplierclass FROM bd_supplierclass WHERE code='1801')))

SELECT b.pk_linkman AS pkLinkman, 1 AS supplierType, b.code, b.name AS name, b.cell AS cell, b.email AS email, b.phone AS phone, b.vjob AS vjob, b.address AS address, b.birthday AS birthday, b.fax AS tax, b.postcode AS postcode, b.memo AS meno, bl.pk_supplier AS supplierId FROM bd_linkman b JOIN bd_suplinkman bl ON bl.pk_linkman=b.pk_linkman WHERE b.pk_linkman IN (SELECT pk_linkman FROM bd_suplinkman WHERE pk_supplier IN (SELECT pk_supplier FROM bd_supplier WHERE pk_supplierclass in (SELECT pk_supplierclass FROM bd_supplierclass WHERE code='1801')))

SELECT s.pk_stordoc as pkStordoc, s.code as code, s.dataoriginflag as dataoriginflag, s.memo as memo, s.phone as phone, a.name as pkAddress, g.name as pkGroup, org.name as pkOrg, s.principalcode as principalcode, ar.detailinfo as storaddr, s.name as name, s.enablestate as enableState FROM bd_stordoc s LEFT JOIN bd_addressdoc a on a.pk_addressdoc=s.pk_address JOIN org_group g on g.pk_group=s.pk_group JOIN org_stockorg org ON org.pk_stockorg=s.pk_org LEFT JOIN bd_address ar ON ar.pk_address=s.storaddr

select c.pk_customer as ncId, c.name as fullName, c.shortname as shortName, a.code as customerAreaId, a.name as customerArea, cz.code as countryZone, case when c.taxpayerid='~' then '' end customerDutyParagraph, org.code as sale_organizationId, org.name as sale_organizationName, c. registerfund as registeredFunds, c.def20 as zhongxinbaoNumber, case when c.tel1='' then (case when c.tel2='' then c.tel3 else c.tel2 end ) end enterprisePhone, c.email as enterpriseEmail, t.code as timezone, cc.code as custclass, f.code as formatdoc, u.user_name as createUserName, u.user_name as lastmodifyUserName, 1 customerType, 1 customerStatus, 4 customerLevel, 0 companyType from bd_customer c left join bd_areacl a on c. pk_areacl = a.pk_areacl left join bd_countryzone cz on c.pk_country = cz.pk_country left join org_orgs org on org.pk_org = c.pk_financeorg left join bd_timezone t on t.pk_timezone = c.pk_timezone left join bd_custclass cc on cc.pk_custclass =c.pk_custclass left join bd_formatdoc f on f.pk_formatdoc = c.pk_format left join sm_user u on u.cuserid = c.modifier where c.pk_custclass in('1001D210000000005TE6','1001D210000000005TE7','1001D210000000005TE5')
